text:
@realDonaldTrump @AlexAzar Donald Trump

Stupidest president ever

Send COVID-19 would go away when the weather got warmer.

COVID-19 only dies at 197°F

The hottest it gets in the United States is death valley at 134.6°F

Why would anyone listen to an ignorant moron?
